column2: MISSOURI PERMIT TEST
column4: Missouri

column2: Question Text
column4: Answer1 Text

column2: 1. The traffic light is green and you want to drive straight through an intersection. If a car is already in the intersection and is making a turn, you must:
column4: enter the intersection and then stop.
column6: wait for the next green light.
column8: let that car complete its turn before you enter the intersection.
column10: drive through the intersection. You have the right-of-way.

column2: 2. What should you do if your vision through the windshield becomes blocked?
column4: Open the side window so you can see.
column6: Pull your vehicle off the road and park it.

column2: 3. This road sign means:
column4: The road ahead turns sharply right then sharply left
column10: A road joins from the left

column2: 4. This sign means:
column4: There is a work zone ahead. Watch for workers.
column6: Business area nearby. Watch for business people.
column8: The driver is near a school and should watch for children.

column2: 5. Drivers should allow a larger space cushion when stopping:
column4: at a yield sign.

column2: 6. A driver who approaches an intersection:
column4: must drive straight through the intersection, even if another vehicle is already in the intersection.
column6: has the right-of-way over traffic already in the intersection.
column8: must yield the right-of-way to traffic already in the intersection.

column2: 7. Who has a greater risk of being involved in a traffic crash?
column4: Shift workers.

column2: 8. This sign indicates that:
column4: drivers may not turn right if traveling at 25 MPH or less.
column6: the highest safe speed drivers should travel around the curve ahead is 25 MPH.
column8: there is a school zone after the curve.
column10: the safe speed around the curve ahead is at least 25 MPH.

column2: 9. This road sign means:
column4: Truck stop ahead

column2: 10. To obtain an instruction permit a person must be ____  years or older.
11. Which of the following is true about the Anti-Locking Brake System?
column4: It prevents skidding.
column6: It allows drivers to steer during an emergency braking situation.

column2: 12. Regulatory signs are:
column4: Warnings

column2: 13. Double solid lines on the roadway mean:
column4: you cannot change lanes.
column8: you can not go across the lines except to turn left to enter or leave the highway.

column2: 14. You must pull over to the edge of the road and allow an emergency vehicle to pass:
column4: only if the emergency vehicle is following you.
column8: only if the emergency vehicle is approaching.

column2: 15. Does a vehicle prepared to enter a traffic circle or rotary have right-of-way over vehicles in the circle?
column4: Only if the light is green.
column6: Yes, but only if they are entering the rotary from the right lane.
column8: No. Vehicles already in the circle have the right-of-way.

column2: 16. This sign means:
column4: Keep to the left.
column6: Drivers will soon be on a roadway with two-way traffic.

column2: 17. You reach an intersection that is not controlled at the same time as a driver on your right, and both of you prepare to go straight. Who has the right-of-way?
column4: The other driver.

column2: 18. The yield sign is ___ and white, with ___ letters.
column4: blue; white

column2: 19. Your BAC depends on:
column4: the type of beverage you drink.
column8: the amount of alcohol you drink.

column2: 20. When driving near light rail vehicles, drivers should:
column4: always obey signs and traffic signals.
column6: expect trains on any track at any time.
column8: never drive around lowered crossing gates.

column2: 21. What does a flashing red light mean?
column4: Drivers may move forward with caution.
column8: The same thing as a stop sign.

column2: 22. When driving behind a motorcycle:
column4: allow at least 4 seconds of following distance.
column6: allow at least 2 seconds of following distance.
column8: allow a following distance of at least 2 car lengths.
column10: allow a following distance of at least 4 motorcycle lengths.

column2: 23. This sign means:
column4: Parking is not allowed.

column2: 24. Service signs are ____ with ____ letters and symbols.
column4: green; white

column2: 25. This white sign means you:
column4: may turn left on a green light when it is safe to do so.
column6: may turn left only on a green arrow.
column8: must wait for the solid green light before you turn left.
